landing.title: Find the Perfect Time

landing.heroNote: Free forever • No credit card required • Works on any device

lightning.title: Lightning Fast

heatmap.title: Visual Heatmap

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share a simple link with your group. Works on any device, anywhere.

smartDates.title: Smart Dates
smartDates.description: Automatically expands to show all dates you need. Add more dates dynamically as needed.

timezones.title: Time Zones

design.title: Modern Design
design.description: Beautiful, mobile-responsive interface with dark mode support. Looks great everywhere.

create.title: Create Your Event
create.description: Give your event a name, select the date range, and set the meeting duration. That's it!

share.title: Share the Link
share.description: Copy the event link and share it with your group via email, Slack, WhatsApp, or any messaging app.

select.title: Select Availability
select.description: Each person clicks and drags to mark when they're available. Changes are saved automatically.

pick.title: Find Best Time
pick.description: Watch the heatmap update in real-time. Darker times mean more people available. Pick the best time!

landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Schedule Your Next Meeting?
